name: ToxoplasmosisTestsForToxoplasmaGondiiIgGOrIgMAntibodyInCerebrospinalFluid
title: Toxoplasmosis (Tests for Toxoplasma gondii IgG or IgM Antibody in Cerebrospinal Fluid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Toxoplasma gondii IgG or IgM Antibody in Cerebrospinal Fluid.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Toxoplasma gondii IgG or IgM Antibody in Cerebrospinal Fluid),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
